page.title: 03LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: Fashion and beauty shops, hotels and restaurants are found at Carmarthen or Llanelli towns. The Carmarthen District and the Dyfed County Councils, Police Sation and Crown Court are found at Carmarthen town, Magistrates and County Court are at Llanelli town. Doctor and Dentist surgeries, Hospitals and Health Centres do not exist here. People travel to the nearest. Welsh is the predominant language, although English is a second language. There are two standing stones, an old water mill and a derelict chapel in the area; these are fully recorded under Local History. Woodlands in the area are mostly deciduous with oak, ash, sycamore etc..
